name: FireBlog - Blogging App
description: A Firebase & Angular 4.0 based Blogging application, built to test features such as authentication, route guards, CRUD on remote databases.

name: ngNews - Angular News Application
description: An application that polls multiple news sources utilising the NewsApi.org API, categories: Tech, Entertainment, Sport & Business. Built using Angular 4.0, HTML 5, CSS 3 and some OO JS. Fully responsive

name: Movie Search Application
description: A movie database search application, built using Angular (4.0), it makes use of Routing, Http parsing, structural directives and is fully responsive to boot!

name: Recipe Book Angular Application
description: A single page application based upon a Recipe Book, you can add, edit, and delete recipes which will be stored on a Firebase NoSQL database. Tech used: Angular(4.0), HTML 5, CSS 3, Bootstrap, Firebase NoSQL DB

name: Spotify Search Angular Application
description: A Spotify Search Application built using Angular 4.0 using the Spotify Web API. Simply enter an artists name and view their albums / preview their tracks

name: GitHub Search Application
description: An Angular application built using Angular 4.0, connecting up with the public github API. Enter a username and you'll be brought a multitude of information about the user.

name: String Editor
description: A simple application with multiple uses, it allows a user to enter a string and provides options for altering the string.

name: Fibonacci Sequence
description: A simple app to display the first 100 iterations of the fibonacci sequence

name: JavaScript Calculator
description: A JavaScript Calculator built from scratch without the use of a tutorial
